dayTra:
The Dayan is always a female Ghostmodel and name
 
If more than 10m away from a player it has normal speed, when closer to a player it's 1,13m/s when the player is standing still and 2,25m/s when the player is moving!
dayAbi:
The Dayan is an early hunting ghost! If a Player is moving near it, the Dayan will hunt at 65% average sanity.
To Testcfor a Dayan check the speed during a hunt while standing still and while moving.
